กดมาจาก Amazon ช่วงลดในราคาแค่ 80 บาทก็ถือว่าคุ้มสุดๆ เกมนี้โคลนระบบ God of War มาทั้งหมด โดยเฉพาะส่วนแอคชั่นคอมโบต่างๆที่คล้ายกันอย่างกับแกะ ภาพกราฟิกในเกมสวยใช้ได้ สภาพแวดล้อมแต่ละด่านสลับไปมาหลากหลายดี แต่มุมกล้องในเกมไม่อิสระซึ่งอาจมีปัญหาเวลาต้องสู้กับศัตรูเยอะๆ (แบบเดียวกับ GoW ที่มุมกล้อง Fix) นอกจากนี้ยังมีการผสมผสานการเล่นแบบอื่นๆเข้ามาด้วย เช่น ขับเฮลิคอปเตอร์ยิงกันสไตล์เดียวกับเกมอาเขต มินิเกมปามีด มินิเกมป้อมปืน เป็นต้น ตัวละครมีการเก็บค่าประสบการณ์อัพเกรดความสามารถต่างๆ ปลดล็อก skill ใหม่ (แถมแต่ละทักษะก็ตูมตามอลังการมาก) ไปจนถึงอัพเกรดอาวุธ สำหรับเนื้อเรื่องเกมนี้อย่าไปเอาแก่นสารอะไรมาก เริ่มมาปุ๊ปปั๊ปก็สับกันแบบงงๆ จุดเด่นเกมนี้จะอยู่ที่เกมเพลย์ออกแนวเวอร์ๆระเบิดภูเขาเผากระท่อมกันสนั่นเล่นเน้นสนุกเอามันส์ก็พอได้ ถ้าคุณมองหาเกมแอคชั่นลุยด่านที่เน้นการ หวดๆๆๆๆ ลุยๆๆๆๆ ที่ไม่ค่อยปรากฏบน PC เกมนี้โอเคอยู่ครับ แต่ไม่แนะนำให้ซื้อราคาเต็มเด็ดขาดนะ

8706510.review: There are a few game-ending crashes here and there, but this is one of the best God of War clones I've played.  It's cheesy, campy and the combo system is pretty good.  The combat can get a bit old after a while, but the game is well worth it, especially if it's on sale.

8701611.review: At least it's better than Donte

8700240.review: Game of the Year, sorry Bioshock Infinite, The Last of Us, Gone Home, or whatever other title might have had the misfortune of releasing in the same year as Marlow Briggs and the Mask of Death.

8700043.review:
This game is equal parts [Prototype] and Dark Siders, with a little dash of Devil May Cry sprinkled on top for good measure. In other words, it's a shooty bang-bang hack-n-slash. Only with Ancient magics and Death Gods.

Like a classic '90's action flick, it throws you right into the action and wastes very little time trying to complicate things with story or plot; just enough to move things along from one big explosion to the next - even bigger - explosion. The protagonist, Marlow Briggs, gets the same treatment: he manages to be a little bit of every black action hero all rolled into one, complete with an overly dramatic and painfully stereotypical 'brotha' persona who is just full of less-than-witty one-liners.

That being said, the game delivers on fun and exciting combat and the action is simply over the top. The platforming and 'puzzle' bits could have been a bit more challenging, but they weren't too bad.

8698392.review: It's nice to see a game get a person of color as their protagonist in a genre filled with white dudes. It also helps that this is a pretty fun action game that evokes titles like God of War in its style of play and epic action set pieces.

8671331.review: This wasn't marketed well...or at all really. That's unfortunate, because it's an surprisingly good game and it's hard to beat the price. If you're a fan of God of War-style character brawlers you're bound to enjoy Marlow Briggs.

8664722.review:
What were to happen if Lara Croft and Batman had a wild night out on the town?  Perhaps this game.  Admitedly its similarities with batman are only its slick combat, combo, weapons and powers system though without that the batman games are mostly just cool set pieces.  It picks up alot of tomb raider vibes in its well done platforming and puzzles etc.  What this game also has is a shit load of b-movie humour delivered by Steve Blum as the ancient aztec death mask who really does some of his finest work in this game.  

This game also has a failry unique setting besides the ancient ruins in the shape of monsterous industrial machines, facilities that blanket the jungle regions, like the keystone pipeline with a penchant for outofthisworld steroids.  The games weapon and power progression is straightforward and matches the slick gameplay.  This is probably in the top 10 platformers/beat-em-ups i've ever played though admittedly my console days are long behind me.  Still this game actually works perfectly fine with mouse and keyboard, though i could see some preferring to use a controller.

The games humour and slick combat and platforming though are why people should play this game, and based on the nearly all positive steam reviews I'm not alone.  Also at around 6 hours or so its a nice diversion from other game types.  It was also just another amusement to peruse the achivements and notice an achievement for skipping all in game cutscenes in a single playthrough...oh game.  Thanks for keeping the smiles going.

8635869.review:
Oldukça abuk, hikayesi yok denecek kadar sıradan ama bir o kadar da eğlenceli bir oyun Marlow Briggs...

Kız arkadaşı kaçırılan ve kendisi de öldürüldükten sonra antik güçler tarafından hayata büyük güçlerle beraber dönen karakterimizle aynı adı taşıyor; Marlow Briggs. Ölüm Maskesi ile beraber devam ettiği bu yolda orak şeklindeki 4 farklı silahı ve 4 farklı mana ile kullanabilinen büyüye sahip. 

Bolca kombo, katıksız aksiyon ve ucuz bulmacalarla dolu Marlow'da Darksiders ve God of War'ı almışlar ancak non-charisma bir karaktere yükleyerek güzel grafik ve eğlence ile yoğurmuşlar. 

Oynarken çok da sıkılmadan bitirebileceğiniz tarzda bir yapım olmuş. Bir efsane ya da hit olmayabilir ancak zaman öldürmekte birebir.

8631250.review: Been playing the game for about 2 hours and loving it so far. Fast paced easy to play.  Recommended for those like me who does not really do well with complicated controls. Get this game now!

8626871.review: a shameless god of war clone with no pretensions of being anything else. pretty good at it, though -- smooth combat, well-optimised engine, story that doesn't waste your time.

8584907.review:
This is the best game that no one has ever heard of.

 Fans of God of War, Darksiders, or even Castlevania: Lords of Shadow will find familiar territory here. The game doesn't take itself seriously and comes off as a nonstop action/adventure game. The game is defintely short, but can be picked up for very very cheap on sale (I got it for $3.76 on Amazon for example.) Despite the fact that the game is short, it is extremely enjoyable. Gameplay is very straightforward hack and slash combat with a splash of magic. Some puzzles, "challenges", and basic platforming breaks the pace between the combat. The story is forgettable and is reminicent of B action movies. It's one of those settings that is so bad that it's just so good. Between the senseless dialogue and childish jokes you'll find one or two genuinely humoruous lines. 

Overall it's a solid experience for a cheap price that shouldn't be missed if you are even a little bit intrested in simliar titles. At $14.99 it is way too expensive, but for under $10 you'll find a solid 6-7 hour game that is much better than "professional" reviews claim.

8581517.review:
Do you remember those old, cheesy action movies that you used to love, regardless of how bad the actually movie was..?  As the trailer and store description implies, "Marlow Briggs and the Mask of Death" is like *playing* one of those.  The fact you're basically in an over-the-top action film is frequently lampshaded throughout the game by characters comments such as "Now if only there was a convenietly placed gun turrent so I could take out all these helicopters..." and "Stop making everything explode!" XD 

The Gameplay tends to be in the same tract as "God Of War" or "Prince of Persia," in that it mixes heavy combat with platforming and puzzles.  Unlike such classics, however, none of the different elements aren't messed together very, with there being clear breaks between different parts of the game.  The camera is also locked in an isometric view, which is rather limiting despite the good graphics.  Despite these faults, gameplay is fun and challenging, with a decent plot and large amounts of genre savvy humor thrown in.

In short, "Marlow Briggs and the Mask of Death" won't be winning awards for game-of-the-year anytime soon, but if you're looking for fast paced action, mindless violence, puzzles, humor, and enough pyrotechnics to make ten Michael Bay movies, you've found the right game.  Full price might be a bit much, but picking this one up on sale is certainly a good idea. :)

8581220.review: Слешер с God Of War подобной механикой. Игра получилась на удивление интересной.

8562473.review: Oyun gercekten güzel keyif alarak oynadım ufak grafik hataları var ama buda can sıkıcı degil

8554683.review:
A God of War clone to a shameless extent, this budget title is a 6 hour rush through a bizarre and humorous schlock-filled, buddy cop, blacksploitation story.

The combat is simple and mindless like the franchise it is ripping it from verbatim but it functions well and is enjoyable. The game's pace is frantic and non-stop from beginning to end switching you between combat sequences, platforming, rail shooting, sliding sequences and even SHUMP sections with the only lull being the games three puzzles.

The game looks surprisingly good for its $15 price tag with some notable backdrops looking really impressive, combat animations that flow nicely and a solid framerate throughout its entirety. However animations in the few cutscenes that are actually fully animated look really janky and awkward which is probably why they opted to do panning/ stop motion type sequences for most of their cutscenes which are unique and work quite well.

Where the game really shines though is its dialogue and sense of humor which is as plentiful and quickly paced as everything else in this game. 

If you enjoy character action games or humorous over the top action stories you will definitely want to check this out.

8540838.review: Perhaps one of the underrated, completely under-the-radar, unpolished gems of 2013. This brawler has wits, good controls, an easy to learn hard to master two-button combat style and some nice visuals going on. I expected a silly, trashy game and I was surprised. Okay, perhaps a bit too linear on the level design. And the borderline cheesy B-movie style cutscenes are not everybody's cup of tea. But I for myself am having a fun time with this game. Not perfect, but lovable in its own way. In the future, this needs a sequel... even if only in spirit. We need more funny silly games like this. (For best experience, this needs to be played with a gamepad, seriously!)

8482572.review:
When I first saw some trailer of the game, I thought it wouldnt be so good. Luckly this game proven me wrong in a way. I played couple of levels now and the story is intrestering, its just like watching Indiana Jones. The gameplay is easy to adapt to, and you get good hints if you get stuck too long in the game by the mysterious "Mask of Death". I also found the mask to be having a very dark sense of humor. While  many consider Marlow Briggs and the Mask of Death to be a bad game, what makes it stand out is that it was designed to be a bad game: which suddenly elevates it into so-bad-it-is-actually-great game.

Technical: So here are a few downsides. For all the great aspects of the game the limited budget does show through in some of the animations. Collision errors occur sometimes where characters are holding things and I did encounter one fall-through-the-world glitch. Those are the only major bad points. On the good side, the enemies are programmed with AI that acknowledges more than just yourself as an enemy. So for instance, if the human enemies encounter the giant bug enemies they will fight amongst themselves while also fighting you. None of that, "Why are the human soldiers working in perfect tandem with the giant penis monsters from Mars?" problems a lot of games have. Other than that everything if perfectly functional if a little raw in some places.


Marlow Briggs and the Mask of the Death is an action game inspired by blockbuster films, comic book heroes, and other action games and is filled with exciting combat and gameplay. I played the game using a X-Box controller, so the gameplay wasn't as bad when I tried it just using the keyboard. 

Marlow Briggs is a mix of Shadowman, Soul Reaver and God of War. Its not as well scripted, the acting is cery clichê, while the mask of death repetetive lines, can at times become very annoying. Overall the game gives you a decent amount of fun.  The quest are overall very easy and not very challenging, even on hard difficulty. You may complete the game in 11 hours play.

8465463.review: Marlow Briggs and the Mask of Boredom

8449944.review: Хороший, несложный экшн, интересная история, все-таки же не каждый раз игра начинается с убийства главного героя, который потом получает силу и начинает сражаться с преступниками. Он всего лишь хочет вернуть свою любимую ну и отомстить. О да, маска смерти не успокоится, пока не отомстит. В общем играть, однозначно играть

8443163.review: Man, its a great game. An real action game. The gameplay is fluid, the history realy don't matter cuz' all you want is blow things up and kill everyone. Its the best game that no one knows.

8424853.review:
First off let me say that I am only just under an hour into this.  That being said, I highly recommend it.  Games like this are what terms like "Over the top", "Full Throttle", "High Octane" and "Action Packed" should be reserved for.

You are given just enough of a story to get you going and then you're thrown right in and kicking more ass than an angry donkey herder before you even have time to settle into your seat.

The gameplay utilizes real-time cinematography style effects directly into the action and cuts in with very unique and almost comic book style animation sequences that let you breathe for a moment without the ass kicking ever skipping a beat.  

The games controls feel intuitive and will be very familiar to those accustomed to other 3rd person action games.  The game does give some controller advice but not in an annoying way.

The lack of camera controls can be a little bothersome at first but you quickly get over it and the game doesn't often leave you in an area with a lot of breathing time anyway.

I love this game so far and will be getting back to kicking ass (and even saving the world?) as soon as I get some rest :B1:.

8376955.review: Finaly... A good "God of War" clone for Steam. Thats all this game is. If you arent a fan of "God of War" maybe this game isnt for you. Just replace ancient greece with a jungle, gods with asian gangsters and Kratos is a Deadguy who has been  brought back to life with voodoo, and now has to save his girlfriend from the asian gangsters. I know, the plot is thin. But trust me the action is solid. This screams "B-Flick" all day, but thats half the fun of this game.

8238585.review:
Marlow Briggs and the Mask of Death to produkcja studia Zoofly znanego z serii Panzer Elite. Gra ukazała się wyłącznie w cyfrowerj dystrybucji, najpierw na XBLA, a później na Steamie. Tytułowy bohater, Marlow Briggs zostaje zamordowany, lecz dzięki interwencji magicznej maski powraca do świata żywych i rusza na ratunek swojej wybrance serca, którą porwał zły Pan Long. 

[b]Co mi się podobało.[/b]

Na duży plus zasługują lokację oraz ich różnorodność. W trakcie rozgrywki przemierzymy jaskinie, dżungle, starożytne świątynie, a także pokłady wielkich maszyn, które prezentują się naprawdę okazale. Lokacje są także nieźle zaprojektowane, chociaż bardzo mnie w nich denerwowały niewidzialne ściany, na które się od czasu do czasu natkniemy. 

Ogromne brawa twórcom należą się za to, że postarali się urozmaicić produkcję i prócz siekania i skakania oddali nam także do dyspozycji poziomy w stylu dawnych celowniczków, a także czasówki, których nie musimy zaliczać, za co duży plus. 

Podobały mi się także dialogi pomiędzy Marlowem a maską. Chociaż żarty są czasami infantylne to jednak przyjemnie się słucha docinających sobie bohaterów. 

Jak na niskobudżetową produkcję to autorzy naprawdę solidnie podeszli do różnorodności broni, w grze będziemy mieli okazję korzystać z czterech rodzajów uzbrojenia, każda ze swoim własnym stylem walki. Kolejny plus dla Zoofly należy się za sporą różnorodność wrogów, chociaż na końcu zabrakło im już trochę pomysłów (a może budżetu?) i walczymy z „napakowanymi” wariacjami poprzednio unicestwionych niemilców. 

[b]Co było takie sobie. [/b]

Generalnie to po macoszemu potraktowano warstwę fabularną gry. Ot mamy złego Azjatę, który porywa naszą pannę i przez całą grę za nimi podążamy, aby na końcu ostatecznie się skonfrontować i zatriumfować, historia jakich pełno. Z drugiej strony jest to produkcja na około sześć godzin grania, więc ciężko wymagać ambitniejszej opowieści. 

Praca kamery także nie jest idealna, mimo, że przez większość czasu pracuje prawidłowo to od czasu do czasu zdarza się jej zgubić naszego bohatera co irytuje zwłaszcza, kiedy walczymy właśnie z grupą wrogów. 

[b]Podsumowanie.[/b]

Marlow Briggs and the Mask of Death to produkcja budżetowa i Zoofly tego przed nami nie ukrywa, jednakże twórcom udało się stworzyć naprawdę przyjemnego slashera z elementami przygodowymi. Gra jest krótka, ale i bardzo przyjemna, te sześć godzin, które jest potrzebne do ukończenia gry zleci bardzo szybko. Gra jest idealną pozycją do nabycia podczas wyprzedaży, zwłaszcza, że jej promocyjna cena oscyluje w okolicy trzech dolarów. Myślę, że każdy kto lubi produkcje w stylu Zeldy czy też Darksiders powinien być usatysfakcjonowany.

8235492.review:
ONE TIME I WAS FIGHTING A MEGASCORPION AND THEN I RODE ON THE SCORPION ON THE WAY TO FIGHT ANOTHER MEGASCORPION. THEN ANOTHER TIME I WAS FIGHTING TWO SCORPIONS AND A HELICOPTER AND THEN A THIRD SCORPION JUMPED ONTO THE HELICOPTER AND CRASHED IT INTO THE SCORPIONS.

8151535.review:
Do you like action games?  Do you like fun?  Do you like awesome characters with nonsensical storylines where the goal is to kill, kill, kill?

If yes, then Marlow Briggs is for you.

Great graphics for the prices, fairly smooth gameplay and a goofy story in line with Just Cause's Rico.  The cool kids are playing Marlow Briggs - join us.

8136457.review: Ein okayer Castlevania/DMC-Abklatsch, der auch gerne mit seiner Einfallslosigkeit kokettiert. Das Spiel ist trashig und mag sich dafür, also gibt's einen banalen Save-The-Princess-Plot inklusive bewährtem Spielgefühl und vielen Deja Vus. Zum aktuellen Sale-Preis von 7€ ist das vollkommen okay! Die Buttonmashing-Action macht Laune, die Grafik ist größtenteils solide und auch wenn die preiswerte Produktion zuweilen deutlich zu erkennen ist, kaschieren die Entwickler geschickt den Umstand. Viele Cutscenes sind daher animierte 3D-Standbilder - billig & chic. Dafür wurde an netten Bosskämpfen nicht gespart, aber alles in allem ist es einfach zu wenig, um aus "Marlow Briggs" eine Marke zu machen. Es bleibt nette, überdrehte wie krachige Junk-Unterhaltung, von der aber nichts hängenbleiben wird. Schon gar nicht vom langweilgen und ausgerechnet titelgebenden Helden.

8133597.review:
Marlow Briggs is an action platformer, with an amateurish art style (mostly the lighting, and unrealistic physics and animations) reminiscient of AAA PC games from the late 90s and early 00s, or more recent XBLA and PSN titles.  Cheesy dialogue, goofy plot and villains, you name it... its like a blast from the past.

Those comments may sound like criticism -- they're not, really.  Marlow Briggs is fun, and worth every penny.  Just don't go into it expecting the kind of drama you get from major titles -- it's not there.  What is there, is campy fun, and lots of explosions, deflecting rockets back at the bad guys with your magic scythe (which makes more explosions), executing brutal combos on bad guys while exploding more stuff off them and then throwing off the nearest cliff.  If you can appreciate that kind of over-the-top fun, you will enjoy Marlow Briggs.

8112121.review: This is god of war if it was a B grade 90's schwarzenegger action movie

8057160.review: Grafikleri oldukça güzel ve aynı zamanda zevkli bir oyun.

8027622.review:
Cooles, abgefahrenes und unterhaltsames Abenteuer-Aktion Spiel im Stil von Darksiders oder Devil May Cry. 

Streng linear wird sich durch die Level gekämpft, ab und zu wird das Ganze durch Minispiele, Rätselpassagen, Quick Time Events, Kletter- und Ausweichpassagen aufgelockert. 

Das Skillsystem ist recht simpel, durch das Töten von Feinden, sammeln von Erfahrungspunkten durch Passagen oder in der Spielwelt werden die vier Waffen bzw. Zauber gesteigert, gleichzeitig erhält man dadurch sowohl mehr Lebens-, als auch Zauberenergie. Allerdings spielen sich die Waffen und Zauber grundlegend unterschiedlich, wodurch Abwechslungs gewährleistet ist. 

Die Grafik ist etwas (amerikanisch) bunt und hell geraten, aber ansonsten sehr stimmig, die Soundeffekte und Muisk passen sehr gut, insbesondere der Sprecher/Begleiter der Geistermaske weiß zu motivieren und das Spielgeschehen durch seine flapsigen Sprüche aufzulockern und lässt einen gerne mal vor dem Bildschirm schmunzeln. 

Die Bossmonster sind insgesamt recht nett und die Bosskömpfe gut gestaltet und fordernd. 
Das einzige was weniger gut ist, sind die teilweise recht langen und häufigen Scriptsequenzen, die teilweise etwas aufgesetzt wirken, was natürlich auch ihre Hauptdaseinsberechtigung ist, und manchmal den Handlungsstrang nicht gut fortsetzen, davon ab jedoch ein klasse Spiel für kurze Unterhaltung! 

Für einen geringen, aber selbst noch Vollpreis zu empfehlen und bietet mit Sicherheit mehr Spielspaß als so mancher Vollpreistitel. Defintiv ein Geheimtipp!

Klare Kaufempfehlung ;).

8025873.review: Ive played 3 hours and its surprisingly good so far. Getting vsync to work partially was a pain.

7981343.review: It certainly not worth the gameplay of DMC, but it's a really good game for his price if you like Beat them all it will please you !

7973859.review: This game is so weirdly good while taking a bunch of cues from other games. 8/10

7971357.review: The title of this game is boring. I wasn't even going to get it based on the title and quick description, I got it after reading a review. So what to say... It's a hilarious third person action game. Solid combat system, great visuals, hilaruous plot, even more hilarious dialogs.

7899459.review:
Marlow Briggs and the Mask of Death is a flawed, but enjoyable, action adventure with some over the top action sequences, cheesy dialogue and story line. Think God of War clone meets B action movie thrills, and you wouldn't be too far off the mark. This game has been a guilty pleasure for me for a week now, and I can only hope for a sequel that will follow this. The game does have some technical glitches (mostly minor, but on one occasion, I had a camera issue where it didn't follow me correctly, and I couldn't continue the game, restarting from an earlier checkpoint fixed this issue), but it should not get in the way of you enjoying one of the best surprises of this year.

7.5 / 10

7831058.review:
A Tonne of fun
No, Really, Marlow Briggs while not a masterpiece is definitely a fun little game, the term "God of war clone" is thrown out there a lot, this however is game play-wise pretty much exactly like God of War, which is good and sometimes bad. Like Kratos, Marlow isn't very good at platforming, but is pretty darn good at swinging.
Unlike God of War, which takes itself way too seriously, Marlow is actually a pretty cool guy, he is very sarcastic and best of all, you are accompanied by an Aztec mask who will always have something funny to say, the bickering between these two always got a chuckle out of me. 
The editing between scenes can be jarring as it's clear most of the animations team effort went into the combat, you won't get much out of the cut scenes, nor will you really care either.
That being said, the game play while not great for the platforming segments, is worth it for the excellent combat, doing insane combos and unleashing devastating elemental attacks is very satisfying, this is why it's okay to be a God of war clone, the God of war games are fun. 
The game also has a good amount of variety, there are the platforming segments which will probably kill you more than the combat segments, there are a good number of different enemies to fight (for a 6-7 hour game anyway) and there are fantastic action segments such as scenes where you are hanging on to a helicopter for dear life (there are even segments from other game genres that took me by surprise in a good way).

This was honestly a pretty unique and satisfying experience for me, a short little game you go into knowing it'll be cheesy, silly and even stupid at times, but is a fun experience regardless, I played the game a month ago within a few days and still remember it fondly, it's not for everyone, but give this a go if you like beat-em-ups or action games in general, it's over the top, silly, action packed and a lot of fun.

7810473.review:
Marlow Briggs and the Mask of Death is a surprisingly fun God of War clone. It has lots of over-the-top action, enormous bosses, flashy fights, colorful graphics, and a great sense of scale. And it's legitimately funny too.

Marlow Briggs and the Mask of Death doesn't do anything new; it's essentially a God of War knockoff in a modern-day setting. But it succeeds at what it sets out to do, and the action and absurd setpieces never let up. Other God of War clones like Dante's Inferno started strong, only to peak early. Marlow Briggs avoids this pitfall by constantly throwing bigger and bigger stuff at the player. This game can be ridiculous at times, but in way that will put a smile on your face.

Marlow Briggs and the Mask of Death is a blatant copy. But it's a highly entertaining one. Check it out.

7766195.review:
Un jeu qui pourrait en remontrer à des gros jeux AAA, par son contenu et par le plaisir qu'il procure.
Le scénario assume le grand n'importe quoi (un guerrier ressuscité par un prêtre sadique), l'action est frénétique et la maniabilité plutôt correcte. Seul bémol : les problèmes de caméra : angles mal placés, sauts au milimètre un peu hasardeux par exemple.
Plusieurs pouvoir, armes et combos sont disponibles au fil de l'aventure, mais il faut avouer qu'elles ne changent pas grand chose (l'une est plus lente et plus puissante, l'autre a un large spectre d'action, la troisième est rapide et la quatrième est un compromis). Les phases d'action alternent la plate-forme, les glissades free style et même le shoot them up (défoulant mais anecdotique).
La durée de vie est correcte (6-7 heures environ) et permet une action resserrée (la diluer aurait eu peu de sens et aurait risqué de lasser le joueur)
Pas le jeu du siècle assurément mais, trouvable à quelques euros, un jeu hautement recommandable.

7741308.review: What a cheese fest of a game, so many parts of it suck, but is still really charming in some ways. The combat is fun, but the talent system might as well not be there. You don't actually even get to choose, since you level exactly the pace, that the game wants you to. Sometimes you litterally don't even have a choice, so why in the world? Also, it runs like a horse with broken legs. By that, I mean that it crashes all the damn time, and it tears up so frequently, that it's not even funny. 7713266.review:
Marlow Briggs is a rather unknown game but become recently popular due to its low price and word of mouth advertising. And, I have to admit, it's actually damn fun to play. 

Marlow plays like some sort of Devil May Cry or God Of War, but where these other games usually take a little break inbetween the action packed moments Marlow moves full speed ahead. There's hardly ever a dull moment in this game. You move from one crazy action packed scene to the next, with usually just a few seconds of breathing room before hacking away at the next group of enemies.

This game isn't extremely long, about 5-6 hours, which is more than enough. After finishing it you're probably done with it anyway. It's fun for a first playthrough, then you'll just delete if off your PC most likely. It doesn't have any replay value. Which might actually be the reason why it's just non-stop action.

The graphics look good, the voice acting is decent and the gameplay solid. 
Marlow Briggs is something you just have to play if you love action games. Especially considering the price these days.

[Rating: 78/100]

7617539.review:
Marlow Briggs and the Mask of Death is a fast-paced third person hack'n'slash game by Slovenian developer ZootFly which didn't catch a lot of attention among PC gamers at its release. Making use of pretty much all of the popular clichés, the game is filled with mindless over-the-top action, tons of explosions and hilarious puns without ever taking itself seriously at any point.

The story proves this instantly: Your girlfriend translates ancient scripts for a rich company mogul somewhere in Central America. You visit her and she explains to you how her boss is up to no good because he wants to perform a ritual that would make him a powerful god and ruler of the world. So you try to take here with you back home, which her boss obviously doesn't like, so he gets you killed with an ancient scythe, not knowing that it is imbued with power that resurrects you and summons the Mask of Death, your new companion on your path to rescue your girlfriend and stop the bad boss.

The game is based on ZootFly's own proprietary, multi-platform engine called ZEN, which doesn't really provide any PC graphics options other than resolution, fullscreen and brightness. That's a shame because the game could've definitely used some AA, which would make the colorful and detailed enviroments look even better than they already do.

While the level design as such is pretty linear, which tends to get boring after a while in a lot of games, ZootFly actually managed to add quite a lot of variety to it. Throughout the game you will encounter combat arenas, puzzles, deadly death traps, quick-reaction minigames, turret sequences and even some top-down shoot-em-up action. This sounds like a weird mix of gameplay elements but is incorporated extremely well into the game, so you never have the feeling that it is out of place.

Combat and controls are exactly like what you would expect from a game like this. Throughout the story, you get access to 4 different and upgradable weapons, each of them with a variety of combos to deliver maximum damage. Additionally, by defeating the ancient gods of fire, earth, water and wind, you unlock their devastating ground attacks, which can help you out of tricky situations or simply cause widespread carnage when facing many of the varying enemies at once.

The puzzle elements in the game mostly consist of moving blocks on trigger platforms or flipping switches to open doors and while they never are overly challenging they actually provide a welcome change to the otherwise extremely fast-paced gameplay, so you can take a short break from all the action.

Usually, with a low-budget title like this, the soundtrack and voice acting are two of the things where the developer tries to save money. Surprisingly enough, the soundtrack is actually pretty decent and, paired with the level design, builds up a really good atmosphere. While the dialogues are a bit cheesy at times, the voice acting itself is good and fits perfectly to the game characters, especially to Marlow and the Mask, who are constantly teasing each other verbally. That makes for some hilarious puns even in the weirdest situations. For example, while you are climbing a stone wall that is about to collapse and kill you, you are arguing with the Mask about who is whose sidekick in this game.

With around 8 hours of playtime for the story, the game provides an extremely decent bang for the buck and if you want to test your skills further, you can give the Challenge mode a shot where you replay the minigames from the story to achieve better scores and times to rank up in the online leaderboards.

Marlow Briggs and the Mask of Death is cheesy. It's mindless. It's over-the-top action. But that is exactly what makes the game so enjoyable and so much fun and it's great to see some developers going bonkers with their games without trying to be serious, dramatic or mature. If something like this is right up your alley, make sure to check the game out!

Oh, did I mention that you can ride giant scorpions in the game?
Because you can!
FRIGGIN' GIANT SCORPIONS!
